channel.description: Recent content in Resources on GentleR Blog

item.title: Resources
item.description: R for data science https://r4ds.had.co.nz/ This is a great starting point for anyone new to R who would like to learn the tidyverse. Also a good recap for old users as well. Cheat sheets You can get the cheat sheets by Help > Cheatsheets or https://www.rstudio.com/resources/cheatsheets/
